venue.name: Windham Rail Trail - Windham Depot Entrance

item.description:
The trail was too wet for us to bike on Wednesday, so we are going to give this another try. This is a 7 mile --- round trip ---from Windham to Salem and back.

Ride at your own risk, dress in layers, and bring plenty of water.

We can stop at the little store for a lite lunch or hot chocolate afterwords. They have wonderful homemade soups. YUMMMMMM!!

Walkers are always welcome.

This event is cross posted on "Portsmouth and Beyond" and "Meeting and Greeting" so only RSVP on one site.

Rain cancels this event.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the parking lot

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: LAST MINUTE --- Mid Week - Mid Day bike ride
